title: Obama: Iran is never allowed to build a nuclear weapon - CNN Video
text: Legal View | Source: CNN Added on 1143 GMT (1843 HKT) August 5, 2015 President Obama delivers crucial remarks at American University outlining the historic nuclear deal that will prevent Iran from acquiring nuclear weapons. More from TV
